name: Stadium 2.5
description:
This is a prototype I did as a programing practice using a heavily modified version of the DoomLoader Project, Doom Shareware assets and Inspired by Sven Co-op's Stadium 3. 

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Moving
  • E -Use
  • Space - Jump
  • Ctrl - Duck
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Numpad - Change weapons
  • Esc - Menu

DISCLAIMER

I do not own any of this assets. Doom is property of id Software and Bethesda Softworks.
